Title: [ANN][ICO] ğŸ¶ Dogracing - The Ultimate Crypto Currency Betting Platform ğŸ¶
Body: Offering Korean translation for your ICO.  Hello, I appreciate your interest. I am noticing a lot of google translated documents or poorly translated posts in many ICOs websites. So, Check your document for fake or not, for free!  In Blockchain 3.0 age, ICO business can easily cross borders to grow and expand further. It's time you had your website translated into Korean languages to reach more Korea CryptoMarket. And It's Good opportunity if you wants to target Asian markets.  I am a Korean native speaker with a knowledge of english And I'm willing to offer my service as a translator. I have a lot of experience translating ICO websites and whitepapers. I will be able to translate your website / whitepaper / thread / any other content. Besides the translation I may also localize it so it become more readable and understandable for Korean speakers.   Please feel free to contact me by email if you are interested.  kr.transico@gmail.com  P.S : If you want I'll send you my portfolio.  Thank you for your time

Author: drwoo
Title: [ANN][ICO] ğŸ¶ Dogracing - The Ultimate Crypto Currency Betting Platform ğŸ¶
Body: Ah ok this is an interesting concept then. A problem I see is if the stakes get too high the incentives to manipulate the system would become very strong. Of course nobody can manipulate Bitcoin, at least not if there isn't a lot of money on the line. But there might be some situations where manipulation could be a problem or not?

Author: ChrisBren
Title: [ANN][ICO] ğŸ¶ Dogracing - The Ultimate Crypto Currency Betting Platform ğŸ¶
Body: I see where you are headed, but the cryptocurrencies chosen to be "raced" will likely be those that are difficult to manipulate (As in they have high daily volumes such as eth, bcc, ripple, eos, etc). Also the amount of money being gambled would make any blatant manipulation very obvious as they would have to win back in the bet more than what they spent on the market to pump the price. That sort of rigging isn't sustainable unless the cryptocurrencies used are extremely low volume.

Author: ChrisBren
Title: [ANN][ICO] ğŸ¶ Dogracing - The Ultimate Crypto Currency Betting Platform ğŸ¶
Body: Quote from: Emilytran on March 23, 2018, 03:39:01 AM Will there be a bounty campaign for marketing purpose dev? I would like to hear from you soon.  The bounty will be launched very soon, keep an eye out  Quote from: drwoo on March 23, 2018, 03:46:39 AM Is this just called Dogracing or is it about betting on Dograces? I don't really get it from your announcement. If it isn't about dogs, why would you call it that way?  The project is called DogRacing as the style of betting is similar. Essentially the 'Dog' that you bet on is a cryptocurrency, and the 'racing' is which cryptocurrency manages to have the highest % gain over a predetermined period of time. Obviously this is not the only function of the better platform and more games will be implemented, it is simply the primary game.  Quote from: lamongan12345 on March 23, 2018, 04:26:02 AM waw .. an exciting new project. when will you create a thread about bounty campaign? see your roadmap, it seems not for long .. then what is the price of 1 token DGR on ico later?  This will be announced in due time
